/*242 char version by FabriceNeyret2
#define mainImage(O,U)                                 \
    float R = iResolution.y/4., i = 0.;                \
    for( vec2 r = ceil(U/R), v = O.zw *11., a,b,q;     \
         i/r.y < 8.;                                   \
         i += 6.28 / ( r.x + 2. )                      \
       )                                               \
        a = cos( iTime+i/r.y + v ) + 5.* cos( i + v ), \
        O = max( O, 1.2*sign(i) - R/25.                \
          * length( clamp( dot( q = 16.*(U/R-r+.5) -a, b -= a ) / dot(b,b), 0.,1.) *b -q)),\
        b = a

*/

//360 char full shader
#define A(x) vec2(cos(x),sin(x))
#define L(a,b) length(q-a-(b-a)*clamp(dot(q-a,b-a)/dot(b-a,b-a),0.,1.))
void mainImage(out vec4 O, vec2 U)
{
    vec2 R=iResolution.xy,
         p=4.*U/R.y,
         q=16.*(fract(p)-.5),
         r=floor(p)+vec2(3,1);
	float d=1.,
          t=iTime,
          s=0.,
          b=r.x*r.y,
          P=2.*acos(-1.)/b,
    	  Q=P*r.y;
    for(;s<Q*b;t+=P,s+=Q)d=min(d,L(A(t)-5.*A(s),A(t+P)+5.*A(s+Q)));
    O+=1.-smoothstep(-64./R.y,64./R.y,d-.2);
}
/*

//319 char version with a focus on the triangle
#define A(x) vec2(cos(x),sin(x))
#define L(a,b) length(p-a-(b-a)*clamp(dot(p-a,b-a)/dot(b-a,b-a),0.,1.))
#define B d=min(d,L((A(t)+5.*A(s)),(A(t+P)+5.*A(s+Q))));t+=P;s+=Q;
#define mainImage(O,U) \
	vec2 R=iResolution.xy,\
         p=8.*(U+U-R)/R.y;\
    float d=1.,\
          t=iTime,\
          s=0.,\
          P=1.047,\
    	  Q=P*2.;\
    B B B B B B\
    O+=1.-smoothstep(-8./R.y,8./R.y,d-.1)/*

/*326 char version with more precise pi calculation and a focus on the triangle
#define A(x) vec2(cos(x),sin(x))
#define L(a,b) length(p-a-(b-a)*clamp(dot(p-a,b-a)/dot(b-a,b-a),0.,1.))
#define B d=min(d,L((A(t)+5.*A(s)),(A(t+P)+5.*A(s+Q))));t+=P;s+=Q;
#define mainImage(O,U) \
	vec2 R=iResolution.xy,\
         p=8.*(U+U-R)/R.y;\
    float d=1.,\
          t=iTime,\
          s=0.,\
          P=acos(-1.)/3.,\
    	  Q=P*2.;\
    B B B B B B\
    O+=1.-smoothstep(-8./R.y,8./R.y,d-.1)*/
